vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συμμέτ-οχος, ον,
partaking with another in a thing, τινί τινος [NT+1st c.AD+]: as substantive, joint owner, [Refs 6th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: sharing with, being partner with, derived from the Greek verb "to share in the possession of something," not found in the NT sharer
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
sharing with, being partner with, derived from the Greek verb "to share in the possession of something," not found in the NT sharer
a partaker with, any one, a joint partaker, Eph. 3:6; 5:7*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: người tham gia; tham dự vào; người dự phần vào. σύν (G4862) + μέτοχος (G3353)
